page.title: 06HORTON CHURCH CHOIR
page.content: A few weeks ago I joined Horton church choir.We go to practice at the Rectory on Friday nights. We sing hymns and psalms,which are sometimes too fast for me.On Sunday I go to church at 10.30a.m. At the back of the church there are curtains.I go behind them and get out my red cloak and hat and white sleeves and collar and put them on. When the other girls and boy arrive the Rector says a prayer. Then we open the curtains, sing a verse and walk up to the choir seats. The Rector says prayers and reads out of the Bible, and we sing psalms and hymns. We use a big book for the hymns,and the book of Common Prayer for the psalms and prayers.When the Rector goes into the pulpit we move to the front seats.We open our Bibles and he talks about it. I like singing the hymns and saying prayers. Kellyrose
